items.name: Meru Highlands Eco Retreat
items.short_description: Escape to serene cabins nestled within indigenous forest, offering breathtaking views of the Meru landscape and a focus on sustainable living. Perfect for nature lovers and those seeking tranquility.

items.name: Kinoru Coffee Heritage Farm & Roastery
items.short_description: Discover the journey of coffee from bean to cup at this interactive farm tour and tasting experience. Learn about Meru's rich coffee heritage and enjoy freshly roasted brews.

items.name: Meru Ancestral Arts & Culture Hub
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in Meru's vibrant traditions through live performances, craft workshops, and historical exhibits. A dynamic space celebrating the indigenous culture and contemporary Meru artistry.

items.name: Rwandeti Adrenaline Park
items.short_description: Get your heart racing with Meru's newest adventure park featuring a thrilling zipline, challenging obstacle courses, and guided forest walks. Fun for all ages looking for outdoor excitement.
items.address: Along Meru-Maua Road, near Rwandeti Forest

items.name: Jua Kali Creative Space & Cafe
items.short_description: A trendy spot showcasing contemporary Meru art, unique artisan crafts, and a cozy cafe serving local and international bites. A perfect blend of culture, commerce, and chill.
items.address: Meru Town Centre, Off Hospital Road

items.name: Nyambene Hot Springs Wellness Spa
items.short_description: Rejuvenate your body and mind at Meru's first natural hot springs spa. Offering therapeutic mineral baths, massages, and serene surroundings in the beautiful Nyambene Hills.

items.name: Meru Urban Bites Food Market
items.short_description: A vibrant hub for foodies, featuring a diverse array of local and international street food vendors, fresh produce stalls, and live music. A culinary journey in the heart of Meru.

items.name: Tots & Trails Discovery Park
items.short_description: An interactive outdoor learning space designed for children, featuring nature trails, educational play zones, and engaging workshops focused on local ecology and culture.

items.name: Kathita River Gardens & Arboretum
items.short_description: A tranquil botanical haven along the Kathita River, perfect for leisurely strolls, birdwatching, and picnics amidst diverse plant species. A green escape within the urban fringe.
items.address: Along Kathita River, near Meru Polytechnic

items.name: The Summit Sky Lounge & Grill
items.short_description: Experience panoramic views of Meru town and Mount Kenya while indulging in gourmet cuisine and bespoke cocktails. Meru's premier rooftop dining and nightlife destination.
items.address: Top Floor, Meridian Plaza, Meru Town
